Uses of Class
application.ProductCategory

    • Uses of ProductCategory in application

      Methods in application that return ProductCategory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProductCategory Product.getCategory()
      This method returns the Product Category
      ProductCategory ProductManager.getCategoryByDescription(java.lang.String description)
      This method returns a Product Category from the list of all Categories that contains the description specified and if no ProductCategory exists with that description, then returns null
      Methods in application that return types with arguments of type ProductCategory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<ProductCategory> ProductManager.getCategoryList()
      This method returns all the product categories in a list
      java.util.ArrayList<ProductCategory> Inventory.getCategoryList()
      This method returns the list of all Product Categories
      java.util.HashMap<ProductCategory,java.util.ArrayList<Product>> ProductManager.getCategoryProductList()
      This method returns a HashMap of all the Product Categories as keys and an ArrayList of all their products as the value
      java.util.HashMap<ProductCategory,java.util.ArrayList<Product>> Inventory.getCategoryProductList()
      Returns the HashMap where the key is Category and the value is a list of products
      Methods in application with parameters of type ProductCategory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ProductManager.addCategoryToFile(ProductCategory pc)
      This method adds a ProductCategory to first line of the file, even if there is not product in that category.
      void ProductManager.addProductCategory(ProductCategory pcat)
      This method adds a product category to the list of product category
      void Administrator.addProductCategory(ProductCategory pc)
      Adds a new product category to the list of product categories.
      void Inventory.addProductCategory(ProductCategory pc)
      This method adds the specified ProductCategory to the Product file and the list of all ProductCategory
      java.util.ArrayList<Product> User.getProductsAvailDown(ProductCategory category)
      Gets the list of available products in the specified product category, sorted by availability in decreasing order
      java.util.ArrayList<Product> User.getProductsAvailUp(ProductCategory category)
      Gets the list of available products in the specified product category, sorted by availability in increasing order
      java.util.ArrayList<Product> User.getProductsCat(ProductCategory category)
      Gets the list of available products in the specified product category
      java.util.ArrayList<Product> User.getProductsPrice(ProductCategory category, int min, int max)
      Gets the list of products available in the specified product category and price range
      java.util.ArrayList<Product> Inventory.sortByCategory(ProductCategory productCategory)
      Gets the list of product in the category
      Method parameters in application with type arguments of type ProductCategory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Inventory.setCategoryList(java.util.ArrayList<ProductCategory> categoryList)
      This method sets the list of product categories to the one specified
      void Inventory.setCategoryProductList(java.util.HashMap<ProductCategory,java.util.ArrayList<Product>> categoryProductList)
      Sets the categoryProductList to the hashMap of category: list of products of this category
      Constructors in application with parameters of type ProductCategory 
      Constructor and Description
      Product(java.lang.String description, ProductCategory category, double price, int quantity)
      This method is another constructor that initializes the Product, without an image
      Product(java.lang.String image, java.lang.String description, ProductCategory category, double price, int quantity)
      This method initializes a Product and adds itself to the list of products in its ProductCategory
